content.text: Hello, I am a test sign read in from a json file! Please enjoy reading me as it took a lot of coordination to get this content here. It might even have paging due to its length??
This is dialog piece number two for good ole test sign.
Just want to make sure I can get a list of these bad boys in without too much trouble :V
This text is special snowflake special text
This text happens after that special text from before
